config.value: Organisations that have contributed to NetBSD: Brains Corporation

head.title: Organisations that have contributed to NetBSD: Brains Corporation

sect2.title: Brains Corporation
sect2.para: Brains Corporation is based in Tokyo, Japan, setup in 1985.

sect2.title: NetBSD/sh3 port
sect2.para: Brains financed a port of NetBSD 1.3.1 to their Hitachi Super-H 3 based mmEye product, then very generously made their diffs publically available, and assisted with the importation of NetBSD/sh3 into the main NetBSD tree.

sect2.title: mmEye hardware contribution
sect2.para: Brains also shipped an mmEye unit to the NetBSD foundation for display in the Comdex 1999 exhibition.
